title: Eco-Smart Modern Duplex in Vibrant Ligota – Perfect for Students
description: This spacious, light-filled duplex offers optimal comfort with 4 well-sized bedrooms and 3 stylish bathrooms. Designed for modern eco-conscious living, the 154 sqm property boasts high-efficiency systems alongside smart touches like a video intercom and guest bathroom. Open living-dining areas blend seamlessly with the contemporary kitchen and flow to a private balcony, ideal for relaxation in a green setting. An on-site EV charging station and thoughtful layout make it ideal for those embracing a sustainable lifestyle.
neighborhood_description: Located in leafy Ligota, this property is surrounded by modern developments that co-exist beautifully with historic architecture. The family-friendly neighborhood is known for its abundant parks, bike paths, and close-knit community, while local cafes and cultural spaces create a lively student hub. With convenient public transport connections and quick access to highways, it’s both peaceful and perfectly placed for university life and city exploration.
lifestyle_benefits: proximity to green areas and parks
community vibe ideal for student life
target_buyer: Ideal for university students, young professionals, or shared households seeking a modern and sustainable home with easy access to campus and city amenities.
market_positioning: This modern duplex stands out in Katowice’s Ligota market with its eco-conscious amenities, four-bedroom space, and superior connectivity—delivering outstanding value for students or professionals seeking sustainable quality in a vibrant neighborhood.
